column4: First time linux user here. I've been trying to install ubuntu on my laptop. it has been stuck for a long time on the partioning section ( around 50minutes ) is this normal? i couldve installed win2000 a few times by now ^^
how large is the drive? is it a blank drive? chock full of data? processor speed?
thats odd. being terribly impatient, i would kill it and restart to see where it pops up. or manually partition with gparted.
this before i have been given the option. it has done the percentage bar and now sits loading before giving me the option to manually or automatically partition
